tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: GoPro: JR Hildebrand Course Preview at the GoPro Indy Grand Prix of Sonoma
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: Shot 100% on the new HD HERO2® camera from ‪GoPro.com. Indycar driver JR Hildebrand narrates his course preview experience as he gets prepped to tear up the track at the GoPro Indy Grand Prix of Sonoma.

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: somehow i know﻿ this track...oh yes granturismo 4..
i did the lap faster than﻿ this.........but then i woke up.
so this﻿ is what ps4 is going to look like
Best helis, Lowest﻿﻿ Price! rcchopperonlinedotcom

I make GoPro videos pretty often but﻿ i hardly get any views, if at least one person could read this comment and watch them it would really mean a﻿ lot to me This is a link to a new cliff jumping video i made /watch?v=_AWj6nq1-Jk&list=UU0a­8cPCqQBnN-b7KPDo_vdA&index=1&f­eature=plcp The rest of my videos are on my channel, Watch in HD! If you read this comment please give it a thumbs up!
I wish it﻿ was 750bhp.
so if﻿ there was a race, which would win? Just wondering
not from 5﻿
now do it without brakes.﻿

what software is this edited on?? and waht resolution? i just got a go pro and got sony vegas pro 10..﻿ and when i render it it always looks shitty.. and when i use the Go Pro software on the website it looks nice.. but i can cut the video.. any reccomendations?
Sensacional!!!! I S2 Indycars!﻿
I think it's amusing that I ID'd the track from the thumbnail just from the corner strips. I spend﻿ too much time working on this track....

Indy has smaller budgets (by a factor of 10), all-privateer teams, tighter﻿ car rules (closer to GP2 in terms of team differences) and races on a greater variety of circuits (road, street and various lengths\types of ovals).
i will never find the adventure or adrenaline in car﻿ "sports".
Whats﻿ the difference beetween indy and f1
shut up biach. i wanna listen to the car sound.﻿ fuck.

In﻿ F1 the drivers don't suck elephant penis. That's the difference.
Oval tracks.. please..
Incredible the quality of his hero2﻿
F1 on most circuits, Indy cars have much less downforce so can get a lot faster on an oval,﻿ but configured properly an F1 car would go faster.
INFINEON RACEWAY﻿
AWESOME!﻿
I love﻿ the steering wheel view, it looks like its from a spaceship and he is fuckin driving that thing!
Is that a Contour at the top﻿ of the car a 0:17 ????????
yup,﻿ infineon raceway
Great elevation changes!﻿

Reviewer.Books: We were soldiers once... and young, The Elegant Universe, A Brief History of Time, LOTR Trilogy.
Reviewer.Movies: Boondock Saints, Batman Begins, Serenity, LOTR Trilogy, Vanishing Point, Death Proof, Bullitt, Planet Terror, Shaun of the Dead, Across the Universe, Fear And Loathing In Las Vegas, Blade Runner
Reviewer.Music: Lots of stuff. From synth-pop to black metal.
